about_the_game:
Embark on an Unforgettable Journey with "Gümüş Kafa"!

Step into the enchanting world of Fireball, where danger and wonder await at every turn. Join Gümüş Kafa, our brave and determined hero, on an epic quest to rescue his father from the clutches of the malevolent King Kendigar. Face impossible odds, unravel ancient mysteries, and navigate treacherous terrains in this breathtaking platformer game.

Immersive Story: Dive into a richly woven narrative that will keep you on the edge of your seat as you uncover the secrets of the Fireball world.

Adrenaline-Filled Courses: Leap, run, and dodge through meticulously crafted levels designed to test your reflexes and wits.

Challenging Enemies: Battle fierce foes and cunning adversaries, each with unique abilities and tactics.

Epic Boss Battles: Confront colossal bosses in heart-pounding showdowns that will push your skills to the limit.

Will you rise to the challenge and help Gümüş Kafa save his father? The fate of an entire world hangs in the balance. Prepare for an adventure like no other in Fireball! Download now and become the hero you were born to be!

name: Fireball

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows 10 and upper versions.
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 540 3.06 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics 4000
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: windows 10 and upper versions.
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-9100 3.6 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce GT 750M
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: Are you ready for a breathtaking adventure in a fantastical world with "Gümüş Kafa"? A unique gaming experience awaits you with an immersive story, adrenaline-filled courses,challenging enemies, and epic bosses. Explore the fantastic world of the Fireball and uncover its mysteries with "Gümüş Kafa"!
